### Monte Carlos Simulation

```{r}
# Set parameters
b = 1
se = 1
sv = 1
p = .99
l = 4
n = 100 
mu_z = rep(0, l)
Qzz = diag(l)
```

```{r}
# Monte-Carlo set-up
montecarlo = function(N, gamma){
  # Coerce gamma to right shape
  gamma = t(gamma)
  # Compute V_beta^hat
  v_beta_hat = solve(t(gamma) %*% gamma)
  
  map(1:N, function(i){
    # Simulate z's
    z = mvrnorm(n, mu_z, Qzz)
    
    # Simulate errors
    e_v = mvrnorm(n, rep(0, 2), matrix(c(se^2, rep(p, 2), se^2), ncol = 2))
    
    # Create x's
    x = z %*% gamma + e_v[,2]
  })
}
```
